name: Broken Steel
description:
Focused on fun and satisfying movement where you can fly through the air and control your movement using ODM gear.

Early in development, roadmap for the future:
More maps
Titan combat
Leveling system, upgrades, rankings

Controls:
W-A-S-D: Movement
Left - Right click: Shoot Grapples
Space: Reel in grapple
Left Control: Slide / Extend grapple (sorry no key bindings settings yet)
Shift: Gas propulsion (Boosts you forward and Up, Down, Left,  or Right, depending on W-A-S-D input)
